A unique ability to mix [[chakra]] with the iron from the user's blood to create black bands that serve as portals to travel to previously marked locations.

== Overview ==
[[File:Code Using Claw Mark.png|thumb|left|Code travelling through a marking.]]
By making contact with or — from a distance — swiping towards a desired location, the user can manifest variously sized portals to any surface.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 56, page 26</ref><ref>''Boruto'' chapter 60, page 13</ref> Once applied, they are able to freely travel to any of them, regardless of distance — even if they're in a [[Kara's Dimension|different dimension]].<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 60, page 2</ref> While it only allows the user to move through them, it can take only one other person with him at a time.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 60, page 15</ref> While mostly used in battle or for transportation, it can also be employed as a means of communication, putting the user' mouth or ear through them to contact [[Ada]].<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 61</ref>

Although primarily chakra-based, they also contain iron from Code's blood which when mixed together causes them to become physical matter making absorption from [[Kāma]] impossible.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 64, page 21</ref>

When his limiters were active, the number of Claw Marks Code could create each time was severely limited. Once they were removed, he could create enough to cover the gigantic [[Ten-Tails (Kara)|Ten-Tails]], and manipulate them into pinching off pieces of the beast into [[Claw Grime]].<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 72, pages 32-35</ref> He can also use them as makeshift bandages to staunch bleeding.<ref>''Boruto: Two Blue Vortex'' chapter 15, page 26</ref>

Removal of Claw Marks may be difficult, as [[Shikamaru Nara]] had to request [[Kawaki]] to use [[Sukunahikona]] to shrink them to unusable sizes.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 70, page 30</ref>

== Drawbacks ==
Claw Marks are one size fits all; if they are shrunk to a certain size, Code will not be able to move between them, being forced to create new ones.<ref>''Boruto'' chapter 67, page 6</ref>
